summary: Implements a mock version of the AWS Elastic Transcoder service for the Moto testing framework, defining in‑memory data structures for pipelines, jobs and presets and generating JSON responses that mimic the real service, including ARN handling and pagination.
business_intent: Allow developers to write and run unit/integration tests that interact with Elastic Transcoder APIs without contacting AWS, ensuring fast, reliable, and cost‑free testing.
